name: Super Mario 24 - A Doom Mod
description: Super Mario 24 takes Super Mario 64 by Nintendo in 1996 for the Nintendo 64 and Recreates it as a Doom wad. Early access will release in 3/11/21 and there is no date yet for a Full Release (I work at my own pace without deadlines). The title ideology is that there is no clear explenation (at least for me) that if Doom is a 16 bit game or a 32 bit game. So I take the number between 16 and 32 and put it in the title replacing the "64".
